title: David Jones – Speech at CBI Wales
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by David Jones, the Secretary of State for Wales, at the CBI Wales event on 7th March 2014.
content:
[![davidjones](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/davidjones-200x300.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/11/davidjones.jpg)
